stories.title: Respond to Site Feedback
stories.description: As a user, I want to provide feedback on the site so that my opinion can be recorded.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the feedback question 'Do you like the site?' is visible, When I view the options, Then I should see radio buttons for 'Yes', 'Impressive', and 'No'.
Given the feedback options are enabled, When I select an option, Then only the selected option should be marked, and the others should be unselected.
Given the option 'No' is disabled, When I try to click on it, Then it should not be selectable.
